    		Student Print Center
    	Located on the second floor of Meriam Library, the Student Print Center provides quick-turnaround copy and print services for students who need to print class projects, resumes, assignments, and study materials.Our services are available throughout the year. We are able to accommodate increased activity during career fairs, rush week, and finals with the help of our student employees.Business Hours:Monday - Thursday7:45am - 5:00pmFriday7:45am - 3:45pmClosed Saturday and Sunday
                        Helpful tips
                    We are cashless. Please review our payment options.We provide staplers, paper cutters and trimmers, hole punches, tape, and glue for your use.Save paper and money by printing and copying double-sided.Masks are optional but encouraged.
            The Student Print Center can help with your copying and printing needs. Most services are available as self-service or can be done while you wait.
		Information TechnologyKendall Hall, 109www.csuchico.edu/itSupport Our CollegeYou might be looking for...Classroom Technology ServicesStudent Print CenterGraphic DesignMedia ProductionsPhotographyPrint ServicesPresentation and Environmental GraphicsWeb ServicesInformation Technology
We acknowledge and are mindful that Chico State stands on lands that were originally occupied by the first people of this area, Mechoopda, and we recognize their distinctive spiritual relationship with this land, the flora, the fauna, and the waters that run through campus. We are humbled that our campus resides upon sacred lands that since time immemorial have sustained the Mechoopda people and continue to do so today.Contact UsNeed Help?FacebookFacebookTwitterTwitterInstagramInstagramReport an accessibility issueReport a broken link on this pageTitle IXPrivacy PolicyCalifornia State University, Chico400 West First StreetChico, CA 95929Copyright © 2023 All Rights Reserved
